fmea_data.Original Text: During operation of C and C milling machine, the spindle motor intimately overheats despite normal load conditions, the temperature sensor, sometimes reports delay or inconsistent readings and vibration levels increases. So coffee went through my 15,000 temp Death battery when I was about 440C?
